caller_intent: Nathan wanted to confirm that his insurance policy was updated from a 24 to a 25 and ensure the change was processed correctly.
resolution_steps: Gary confirmed the policy change was completed via the Progressive app.
Gary advised Nathan to check the updated policy documents via email or the agency's app.
Gary sent a link for the agency's 'glove box' app to Nathan for future reference.
Nathan confirmed he received an updated policy email and verified the change reduced his premium.
summary: Nathan confirmed his insurance policy was successfully updated from a 24 to a 25 via the Progressive app. Gary provided follow-up instructions and shared the agency's app for future document access. Nathan received confirmation of the change and noted a premium reduction.
